name: In re Nomination Petition of Mitchell W. MELTON. Appeal of Mitchell W. MELTON
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Melton

judges: Mr. Chief Justice Nix did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of Mitchell W. MELTON. Appeal of Mitchell W. MELTON.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
Mr. Chief Justice Nix did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
JUDGMENT
ON CONSIDERATION WHEREOF, it is now hereby ordered and adjudged by this Court that the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael J. McAllister, Philadelphia, William R. Davis, Secretary, Dept. of State, Harrisburg, for appellee Frank L. Oliver.
casebody.head_matter:
509 A.2d 1255
In re Nomination Petition of Mitchell W. MELTON. Appeal of Mitchell W. MELTON.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 13, 1986.
Decided May 16, 1986.
Mitchell W. Melton, pro se.
Michael J. McAllister, Philadelphia, William R. Davis, Secretary, Dept. of State, Harrisburg, for appellee Frank L. Oliver.
